name: Flanders Investment & Trade
membership: ETPOA - European Trade Promotion Organisations' Association
memberOrga: Als openbare instelling levert FIT diensten aan alle Vlaamse KMO's met plannen voor internationalisatie. Geen lidmaatschap is vereist om dienstverlening te ontvangen. Jaarlijks verwerkt FIT duizenden vragen van Vlaamse bdrijven.
goal:
Flanders Investment & Trade (FIT) is an organisation of the Government of Flanders, Belgium, in charge of trade - and investment promotion.
FIT supports Flemish SME's with their internationalisation plans.
FIT has a network of 90 offices worldwide to support Flemish SME's with their questions on exporting to and setting up in foreign markets inside and outside of the EU.
Every year, many trade missions, trade fair participations, seminars, contact days, B2B visitor programs, buyers missions and other activities are organised to open up new markets for the Flemish SME's.
FIT also attracts foreign investment into Flanders, Belgium.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
